features: Experience a Lasting, Deep Scent for 7 days with Niche Perfume. As an exceptional fabric softener with deodorizing properties, it eradicates unpleasant smells on clothes and ensures a long-lasting fragrance. Fragrance That Remains After Drying.

For the safety and reassurance of me and my family. We use premium plant-derived ingredients, causing no irritation to even the most sensitive skin. Our fabric softener contains USDA certified natural ingredients
Our product is 100% vegan certified by the Korea Vegan Certification Authority. We do not use animal-derived ingredients, or conduct any form animal testing.
Highly Concentrated, Use just 1/3 of the amount compared to regular fabric softeners.
Not only does our product provide fabric protection & softness, but it also delivers an excellent anti-static effect.
As part of our commitment to sustainable lifestyles, we use containers made from 100% recycled post-consumer plastic.
Environmentally friendly, achieving over 93% biodegradability, leaving no detergent residue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SIGNATURE FRAGRANCES Tulip & Freesia [#Floral #Powdery #SoapScent] - Experience the floral soap fragrance, as if embracing a bunch of fresh flowers. The moist sweetness of tulips coupled with the clear and transparent scent of freesia will softly envelop you all day long. - TOP : Freesia, violet MIDDLE : Pink tulip BASE : Musk, Green

"No, it's not a perfume spray, I changed my fabric softener" In your quest for a unique fragrance, why use the same scent for fabric softeners? Now, you can switch your fabric softener to a 'Niche Fragrance'.

Experience a Lasting, Deep Scent for 7 days with Niche Perfume As an exceptional fabric softener with deodorizing properties, it eradicates unpleasant smells on clothes and ensures a long-lasting fragrance. Not only does our product provide fabric protection & softness, but it also delivers an excellent anti-static effect. Our product softens stiff fabrics, reduces skin irritation due to static electricity, prevents the accumulation of fine dust, and minimizes the formation of fabric pills. Softener without residual detergent LAVOIR fabric softener, achieving over 93% biodegradability, leaving no detergent residue. 'Korea Institute for Clothing Testing' Certification year/month : 2022.04.15

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Floral Scent and Non-Allergenic
reviews.reviewText: I was on the lookout for a fabric conditioner/softener that is non-allergenic due to my sensitive skin. When I saw this LAVOIR fabric conditioner that uses only plant-derived ingredients I ordered it to try.The bottle is cute and when I unscrew the top cover, there is a safety seal foil that protects the liquid inside from contamination or accidental spill.True to what it claimed my skin did not get any irritation when it came in contact with the underwear I was wearing. The fabric like my denim pants feels softer with minimal wrinkles, plus I love the floral but non-irritating scent that lingers and seems long-lasting.Overall am happy with this fabric conditioner. Highly recommended if you have sensitive skin but still want to wear fresh-smelling clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Concentrated Fabric Softener
reviews.reviewText: This fabric softener isn't as thick as store brands, so I wasn't sure what to expect at first. I used just a capful in a standard load of towels in my washer along with a detergent sheet and they came out smelling fresh and much lighter of a scent than the bottle sniff test would suggest. I never use dryer sheets with the towels and it didn't perform much differently than the major brands for towels - they are moderately fluffy from the softener, and a very light scent after drying on high. The next day, the towels had very little scent remaining, which is OK by me but if you're wanting something that continues to have that scent you may want to look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Warning on bottle: Increases Flammability
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the following item: LAVOIR Perfumed Fabric Conditioner (Tulip & Freesia), Premium vegan Fabric Softener, Highly Concentrated, 16.9 fl oz (500 ml)This is an extremely expensive bottle of fabric softener. This bottle is 16.9 fluid ounces, and the amount to use for a large load is 25ml, which is about 1.75 tablespoons. Please note there is no measuring device included. So this bottle will soften approximately 20 loads for the cost of $25/bottle.Now as I read the bottle there is a warning that I found very frightening. It is as follows: CHILDREN. [WARNING] Do not use this product. On Fluffier fabrics such as fleece or terry cloth as it may increase the flammability of these fabrics. On children's sleepwear or other garments labeled as flame resistant as it may reduce the flame resistance.I do not have children in my home, but still I found that warning to be unsettling. I did use the softener on my dish towels, some terry and some cotton. They all came out soft with little to no scent. I was not impressed at all.I do not recommend this fabric softener at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sheets feel soft, no fragrance though
reviews.reviewText: I washed a set of king sized sheets to test this out- one flat sheet, one fitted sheet, and 4 pillowcases. I used about 25 mL of the product in the fabric softener compartment of my washing machine. I used a 2 hour white cycle with hot water and regular unscented laundry detergent.After washing and machine drying, the sheets came out soft but without any noticeable fragrance to them. I was a little disappointed since the scent was nice in the bottle but it didn't really transfer to the sheets. I did feel that the sheets were soft and smooth, though, which is nice.Overall, I think this fabric softener softens but there may not be much meaning to it being fragranced. The scent in the bottle is a nice, slightly feminine floral. It's more sweet than herbal, but again, may not matter much if it doesn't make it onto the laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco-Warrior Washday: Softness Without Residue or Scent Overwhelm
reviews.reviewText: Being picky about laundry products pays off! As my daughter used to have sensitivities to detergents, I'm meticulous in my choices. I first tested this detergent on my own clothes. While the bottle suggests 25ml for a regular load as it's a super concentrated fabric softener, there's no measuring cup provided. Resourceful me repurposed a small measuring cup from cough medicine (thankfully not discarded!). In both uses, the clothes came out beautifully soft, with no overpowering scent - perfect for sensitive individuals. I truly appreciate the company's dedication to environmental responsibility, leaving no residue and using 100% recycled post-consumer plastic for their containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost Scent Free, Very Delicate
reviews.reviewText: This fabric softener would be perfect for people who have sensitive skin or dislike strongly scented laundry products. It's got a very light floral scent when you smell it in the cute pink and white bottle. I used the amount suggested which was much less than my usual fabric softener. It would be great if the cap could be used for measuring. I had to bring a measuring cup down to the basement and kind of guesstimate on how much to use since the instructions are different in the USA. The fabric softener did a good job of making a load of bath towels soft and fluffy. The scent didn't stay in the towels. I used it with unscented laundry sheets. This is supposed to have less chemicals and I'm all for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pros are obvious - a great scent, somewhat conscientious ingredients, and relatively easy to use.The primary negative is use, specifically measuring the correct amount. Perhaps this is nitpicky, but it requires you measure the amount by using your pre-existing measuring spoons (20 ml or 1.35 tablespoons). Ideally, a product will make use of the cap to accomplish this step.Overall, it meets its purpose and smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This fabric softener smells good in the bottle
reviews.reviewText: The Fabric softener smells good in the bottle but after using the recommend amount with a small load of towels there was virtually no fragrance on the towels. The instructions say to use 20ml for a regular size load. 20ml is approximately two table spoons. Since they give you no way to dispense the fabric softener I used the cap for measuring which is about a table spoon. I used three cap full for a load that included two bath towels and three hand towels. The towels did feel soft but I was disappointed in the lack of fragrance especially since the product in the bottle smelled good. LAVOIR Perfumed Fabric Conditioner is currently on Amazon for $25 dollars. That is WAY overpriced.
チューリップ＆フリージアまず、ボトルが可愛い。蓋を開けると優しいフローラルな香りで、洗濯後もほんのり香ってくれます。他の香りも試してみたい。
チューリップとフリージアの香りです。強い香りでなくほんのり香ります。容器はピンクと白で可愛いです。計量するものが付いてないので付いてたらもっと良かったと思います。

reviews.reviewerName: りなりくチャンネルりなりくチャンネル
reviews.reviewText: チューリップ&フリージアの香りの柔軟剤です。ボトルがとってもかわいくて気に入っています。香りは優しい香りです。使用量が少なくてすむところが嬉しいです。計量がついていないので、少し不便です。
苦手な強い香りでは無く安心しました。優しい良い香りで、ふっくら仕上がりとてもお気に入りの柔軟剤です。これからもリピ予定です。
